get.description: Basic health check.

get.description:
Get list of matches with optional filters.

Competition codes:
- PL: Premier League
- PD: La Liga
- BL1: Bundesliga
- SA: Serie A
- FL1: Ligue 1
- CL: Champions League
- EL: Europa League

parameters.name: competition

schema.description: Filter by competition code (e.g., PL, PD, BL1)
schema.title: Competition

parameters.description: Filter by competition code (e.g., PL, PD, BL1)

get.description:
Get current league standings for a competition.

Competition codes:
- PL: Premier League
- PD: La Liga
- BL1: Bundesliga
- SA: Serie A
- FL1: Ligue 1

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get the 5 best picks for the specified date ONLY.

Selection criteria:
- Minimum 5% value vs bookmaker odds
- Minimum 60% confidence
- Diversified across competitions

Uses database caching to persist predictions across server restarts.

parameters.name: date

schema.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format, defaults to today
schema.title: Date

parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format, defaults to today

get.description:
Debug endpoint to verify football-data.org API configuration.

Returns detailed information about:
- API key configuration
- HTTP header status
- Live API connectivity test

schema.title: Response Debug Api Status Api V1 Debug Api Status Get

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get current ML system status.

Returns information about:
- Whether models are trained and available
- Age of training data
- Feature engineering state

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Start data collection in background.

Collects historical match data from football-data.org API.
This is a long-running task that runs in the background.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Start model training in background.

Trains XGBoost and Random Forest models on collected data.
Requires data to be collected first.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Run full ML pipeline in background.

Executes:
1. Data collection from API
2. Model training on collected data
3. Model reloading for inference

This is a long-running task (5-15 minutes depending on API rate limits).

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get current pipeline execution status.

Returns whether a pipeline task is running and the result of the last run.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Trigger weekly data synchronization.

This should be called every Sunday evening (e.g., via cron job).
Syncs matches for the next 7 days and all standings.

Cron example: 0 20 * * 0 curl -X POST https://api/sync/weekly

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide
Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Sync recent finished matches and verify predictions against actual results.

This endpoint:
1. Fetches matches from the past N days to get final scores
2. Updates local database with match results
3. Verifies predictions against actual outcomes

parameters.name: past_days

schema.description: Days to look back for finished matches
schema.title: Past Days

parameters.description: Days to look back for finished matches

get.description:
Enrich a match with contextual information using RAG.

This endpoint fetches news, injuries, sentiment analysis,
and other contextual data for a match.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Generate a detailed analysis of match context using LLM.

This is a more intensive analysis than the basic enrichment.

schema.title: Response Analyze Match Context Api V1 Rag Analyze Post

get.description:
Get full enrichment data for a match including:
- Team form (last 5 matches)
- xG estimates
- Bookmaker odds
- Weather forecast
- H2H history
- Standings context
